/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many urban areas. The street itself is lined with trees, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the concrete jungle. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and vehicles.
